thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com
thread.title: Janet Barca

author: Janet Barca
title: Janet Barca
text: For my Plan most of the option choices are varied and taste very good. However, I wish there were more options prepared by Nutrisystem for Powerfuels and Smartcarbs. Most of the choices listed in my Plan book from the grocery are not what I like most, therefore are boring. I would also like Nutrisystem Snack choices available with lunches as well as the current evening Snack without jeopardizing my Plan. Don't know if this is possible, but just a thought.
